document.full_text: schlumberger ltd  and weatherford international ltd   said on thursday the outlook is promising for the oilfield service industry as energy companies speed exploration in a time of high oil prices and growing demand.
document.title: schlumberger, weatherford see bright outlook
lines_and_colors: schlumberger ltd  and weatherford international ltd   said on thursday the outlook is promising for the oilfield service industry as energy companies speed exploration in a time of high oil prices and growing demand.
